verses.verse: A Psalm; a Song at the Dedication of the House. A Psalm of David. I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; For thou hast raised me <S%H1802>up<s%>, And hast not made my <S%H341>foes<s%> to rejoice over <S%H8055>me<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H7768>cried<s%> unto <S%H7495>thee<s%>, and thou hast healed me.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>; Thou hast kept me <S%H2421>alive<s%>, that I should not go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praise unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O ye <S%H2623>saints<s%> of <S%H3034>his<s%>, And give thanks to his <S%H6944>holy<s%> memorial <S%H2143>name<s%>.

For his <S%H639>anger<s%> is but for a <S%H7281>moment<s%>; His <S%H7522>favor<s%> is for a <S%H2416>life-time<s%>: <S%H1065>Weeping<s%> may <S%H3885>tarry<s%> for the <S%H6153>night<s%>, But <S%H7440>joy<s%> cometh in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
As for <S%H559>me<s%>, I said in my <S%H7959>prosperity<s%>, I shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

Thou <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, of thy <S%H7522>favor<s%> hadst made my <S%H2042>mountain<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5797>strong<s%>. Thou didst <S%H5641>hide<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>; I was <S%H926>troubled<s%>.
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; And unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> I made <S%H2603>supplication<s%>:

What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is there in my <S%H1818>blood<s%>, when I go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>? Shall the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H5046>thee<s%>? shall it declare thy <S%H571>truth<s%>?
Hear <S%H8085><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>: Jehovah, be thou my <S%H5826>helper<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H2015>turned<s%> for me my <S%H4553>mourning<s%> into <S%H4234>dancing<s%>; Thou hast <S%H6605>loosed<s%> my <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H8057>gladness<s%>;

To the end that my <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to <S%H1826>thee<s%>, and not be silent. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
